I'm heading to Paris soon. My friend recommended 'Le Marais Boutique' as a great place to stay. Could you check out the reviews and ratings for me? If it's rated higher than 4, go ahead and make a reservation for me from January 11th to January 15th 2025. Thanks a lot!

To help my friend Emma Johnson with her hotel search, I will first use the 'get_hotel_reviews' function to check the reviews and ratings of 'Le Marais Boutique' in Paris. If it's rated higher than 4, I will then proceed to make a reservation using the 'reserve_hotel' function for the specified dates: January 11th to January 15th, 2025.
